summary.span: 获取一个此选项卡所在的 的引用。

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用*上下文选项卡*用于显示组的相关仅在特定上下文中的命令。You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context. 上下文选项卡组是显示还是隐藏基于指定的条件。Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria. 例如，当检测到平板电脑输入，或可能选定映像对象时显示的图片工具选项卡组，则可能显示墨迹工具选项卡组。For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示名为**钢笔**，位于**墨迹工具**上下文选项卡组。The following example shows a named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group. ```xaml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 键提示上显示当你按 ALT 键。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
